metadata.inclusion:
1.check Z-WaveTM Controller entered inclusion mode.
2.Press the Add/Remove function “enterPC” is enter “0000”(default) enterPC->enter-> 1 -> 0 ->enter
3.After add successful, it will have twice beep sounds.if inclusion fail it will have five beep.
Notice 1 : if you reset doorlock ,you have to do OPERATING INSTRUCTION no.1(door handling identification process )
Notice 2:if Door lock in learn mode,device can stop on operation setting mode,until success include or 60s time out.
metadata.exclusion:
1.check Z-WaveTM Controller entered exclusion mode.
2.Press the Add/Remove function “enterPC” is enter “0000”(default) enterPC->enter-> 1 -> 0 ->enter
3.After remove successful, it will have twice beep sounds.if exclusion fail it will have five beep.
Notice 1 : if you reset doorlock ,you have to do OPERATING INSTRUCTION no.1(door handling identification process )
Notice 2:if Door lock in learn mode,device can stop on operation setting mode,until success include or 60s time out.
metadata.reset:
1.Press the black key in battery cover, and until 5s time up.device can beep two times.
2.Device can send resetlocally notification

note : Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
